content: whether you re crafting a heartfelt gift or adding a personal touch to your home décor these granny squares are the perfect canvas for your imagination this pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/pretty-granny-square-pattern/
